scripts.dev:web: dotenvx run -f db/.env.develop -- pnpm --prefix apps/web dev
scripts.dev:docs: dotenvx run -f db/.env.develop -- pnpm --prefix apps/docs dev
scripts.dev:worker: dotenvx run -f db/.env.develop -- pnpm --prefix apps/worker dev
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:web" "pnpm run dev:worker" "pnpm run dev:docs"
scripts.build: dotenvx run -f db/.env.develop -- pnpm --prefix apps/web build
scripts.deploy:docs: git subtree push --prefix apps/docs dokku-docs main
scripts.build:develop: dotenvx run -f db/.env.develop -- pnpm --prefix apps/web build
scripts.version-packages: changeset version && pnpm install -w --no-frozen-lockfile && git add -A
